actions.name: SlackAction
actions.description: Sends whatever is sent to in the body to slack in the channel provided constant "SlackWebHook". The webhook must be set up within the slack integrations in the slack application.

actions.name: TriggerJenkinsJob
actions.description: Triggers a remote Jenkins job. The job must be configured to allow remote triggers. This assumes a crumb is required as part of the application security settings. All Jenkins constants must be filled out and setup within Jenkins for this to work properly.

actions.name: FormatJavaCucumber
actions.description: Accepts raw, standard surefire reports from Java's Cucumber framework. Attachments may be included in the 'embeddings' field for each step.

actions.name: UpdateQTestWithFormattedResults
actions.description: Uses the auto-test-logs bulk uploader API call to qTest Manager to upload formatted test results.

actions.name: scenarioColors
actions.description: Updates qTest Scenario colors based on the pass/fail of the test case step

actions.name: FormatPythonPyTestJUnit
actions.description: Formats raw python pytest junit results to a format that the bulk uploader pulse rule can read.

actions.name: FormatPostmanJson
actions.description: Formats raw postman json results to a format that the Pulse Rule to upload results to qTest Manager can read.
